entry.lex: Alan Bean was born in Wheeler, Texas in the United States. He was selected by NASA in 1963, and spent 100305.0 minutes in space.

modifiedtripleset.mtriple: Alan_Shepard | was a crew member of | Apollo_14

entry.lex: Alan Shepard was awarded the Distinguished Service Medal (United States Navy and the Department of Commerce Gold Medal. He was a crew member of the NASA operated Apollo 14 mission.

modifiedtripleset.mtriple: William_Anders | was a crew member of | Apollo_8

entry.lex: William Anders was born in British Hong Kong, where Chris Patten is a representative. William was a crew member of Apollo 8, and served along Frank Borman.
Born in British Hong Kong, William Anders was a crew member of Apollo 8 with representative Chris Patten and Apollo 8 member Frank Borman.

originaltripleset.otriple: Buzz_Aldrin | almaMater | "Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Sc.D. 1963"@en

modifiedtripleset.mtriple: Buzz_Aldrin | was a crew member of | Apollo_11
Buzz_Aldrin | almaMater | "Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Sc.D. 1963"

entry.lex: Buzz Aldrin was born in Glen Ridge, New Jersey, was part of Apollo 11 and in 1963 graduated with a Sc. D. from MIT and is now retired.
Buzz Aldrin was born in Glen Ridge, New Jersey. He obtained an Sc.D in 1963 from Massachusetts Institute of Technology. He was a crew member of Apollo 11 and has retired.
Buzz Aldrin, now retired, was born in Glen Ridge, New Jersey and graduated from MIT ScD in 1963. He was a crew member of Apollo 11.

modifiedtripleset.mtriple: Buzz_Aldrin | was a crew member of | Apollo_11

entry.lex: Buzz Aldrin was born in Glen Ridge, New Jersey. He Joined NASA in 1963 where he became a crew member of Apollo 11 as a Fighter pilot.
Buzz Aldrin was born in Glen Ridge, New Jersey. He was a fighter pilot before being selected by NASA as a crew member of Apollo 11 in 1963.
Buzz Aldrin was born in Glen Ridge New Jersey. He was a fighter pilot who was selected by NASA in 1963 to be a crew member of Apollo 11.
